entry.title: To Get the Bell Off the Cat
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,516Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 53

Summary: Dick Grayson makes an announcement that he’ll marry whoever can get the bell from his cat’s collar. The response to that is much greater than he was expecting.
